description: Fix all TypeScript errors in src/services/modules/ API services

workstreams.description: Analyze errors and create execution plan

decisions.decision: Fix AdministrationService import path from administration.types to administration
decisions.rationale: Type file is named administration.ts not administration.types.ts

decisions.decision: Add ADMIN endpoints to constants/api.ts API_ENDPOINTS
decisions.rationale: AdministrationService requires API_ENDPOINTS.ADMIN but it doesn't exist in constants

decisions.decision: Fix ZodError handling to use .issues instead of .errors
decisions.rationale: ZodError has issues property, not errors property
Function is called but not imported from ../core/errors
